ARABIC: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Each one of them denied the Messengers and so My punishment was justly carried out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Of all these there was not one who did not deny the messengers. So My retribution was justified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Each of them gave the lie to Messengers and My decree of chastisement came upon them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Each of them who rejected the Messenger become subject to Our punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: None of them was such that it did not deny the Noble Messengers, therefore My punishment became inevitable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Not one of them but denied the Messengers; therefore My torment was justified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There was none of them but called the apostles liars, so just was My retribution.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: not one, that cried not lies to the Messengers, so My retribution was just.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Not one of them but did deny the messengers, therefor My doom was justified,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There was not one of them but treated their messengers as liars, so My punishment rightly overtook them:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: There was not one but belied the apostles, wherefore justified was My wrath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There was not any one but such as impugned the apostles; so My retribution became due [against them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers, but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Not one of them but belied the Messengers, therefore My Torment was justified,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There was not one of those that did not belie the Messengers. Therefore, My retribution was realized.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: None of them but denied the messengers, so My retribution was deserved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:14] Each one, of the factions, did not but deny the messengers, for when they deny one, they have [in effect] denied them all, since their call [to God] is [the same] one, namely, the call to [affirmation of] His Oneness. So My retribution was justified, [it was] necessary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Not one of them but did deny the messengers) He says: all these folks denied the messengers just as the Quraysh deny you, (therefore My doom was justified) therefore My chastisement is enjoined upon them,
